UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: De novo expression and antibacterial potential of four lactoferricin peptides in cell-free protein synthesis system.
Literature.Author: El-Baky NA, Elkhawaga MA, Abdelkhalek ES, Sharaf MM, Redwan EM, Kholef HR

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus MR(MIC=5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=1.25µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=1.25µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=2.5µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium ATCC 19430(MIC=1.25µg/ml)
